parameters.name: MaxExecuteCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of queries that can be performed each day.

parameters.name: MaxResultCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of rows that can be queried each day.

parameters.name: Mobile
parameters.description: The DingTalk ID or mobile number of the user.

parameters.name: RoleNames
parameters.description: The roles that the user assumes. For more information about the valid values, see the Request parameters section in the [UpdateUser](~~465812~~) topic.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

> : To view the ID of the tenant, log on to the Data Management (DMS) console and move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner. For more information, see [Manage DMS tenants](~~181330~~).

parameters.name: Uid
parameters.description: The Alibaba Cloud unique ID (UID) of the user to update.

parameters.name: UidString
parameters.description: The UID of the String type. If you specify this parameter, the UID of the Long type is replaced.
